ygData.subject: Re: Castle Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, but doing that really improved my quality time with my ingame girlfriend ;-)  We had funny killing the silly goblins.  I ve got it down to a science
ygData.messageBody:
> Harm's just cranky because he promised me he would get me a Lambent Helm,
> and he had to kill 25 DW goblins to get the Opoline helm to make it
> with. If I had to crank through 25 DW goblins, I'd be irritated, too.

Yeah, but doing that really improved my quality time with my ingame
girlfriend ;-) We had funny killing the silly goblins. I've got it
down to a science now, I can pull them separately too. I was just
one unlucky bard. Now I kinda wanna go back and get another helm
so I can try to suit up in full black. I have a charred bp, charred
gloves, charred boots, if I get some legs and arms that are black
I can toss on some silver bracers and look like an SK when illusioned.
hehehe. I need to find one of those 2h bone bladed axes that have BRD
on them. Didn't someone say if we wield a certain item, it looks like
an exe axe?

> Thanks, Harmonic!

You deserved it, brother.

Harmonic.
